content:
From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
The Isabelle proofs for the seL4 microkernel are now out on
http://github.com/seL4/l4v

and the code on
http://github.com/seL4/seL4

For more information see http://sel4.systems

Enjoy!
Gerwin

ps: let us know if you are developing anything cool with or on the proofs or the kernel -- we will probably set up a list of community projects when a few of these have taken off.

The information in this e-mail may be confidential and subject to legal professional privilege and/or copyright. National ICT Australia Limited accepts no liability for any damage caused by this email or its attachments.
